content:
In the following tutorial you will be guided through the 
 basic game mechanics. 
 
 This will take you about 10 min.
In Gamify-IT, each course contains a number of overworlds which offer various activities.

Here are the default key bindings for the game. 
 You can change them later in the key bindings menu. 
 
 W - move forward 
 A - move left 
 S - move back 
 D - move right 
 LeftShift- sprint 
 E - interaction 
 Esc - cancel

Signs help explain important game concepts. 
 Don't miss reading them. 
 Let's go find one!

Books can be found all around! 
 Interact with them to discover something new...

NPCs are a great source of extra knowledge and helpful hints. 
 Press E to talk to them!

Tired of walking everywhere? 
 Try using teleporters - they'll get you there faster!

Good job! 
 To use it, you need to find at least one more teleporter.
buttonLabel: FIND ANOTHER TELEPORTER AND USE IT

content:
Well done! 
 Now it's time to jump into a game.

Congratulations! 
 You've completed your first minigame. 
 
 Successfully playing minigames earns you coins. 
 
 To explore what coins are used for, click the current area name in the progress bar at the top left.

Welcome to the leaderboard and the shop! 
 The more coins you collect, the higher you'll rank on the leaderboard. 
 Additionally, you can spend coins in the shop for outfits and accessories. 
 Note that these features will only be usable in the overworld.

Did you know that there are also dungeons? 
 They can be unlocked by succesfully playing minigames.

Welcome to the dungeon! 
 Complete minigames in dungeons to unlock new worlds.

Well done! 
 You've mastered the key concepts of Gamify-IT. 
 Now, it's time to enter the overworld. 
 
 Find the pit that will lead you there!
